title: New ARAM map crashes once a game.
body: Well, the game simply stops responding. I have to alt-ctrl-del to close the game and launch it again. It is always around the same time, more of less 5-7 mins into the game.

replies.body: OS, version, other software? Have you tried repairing, it could be a corrupt file.
W10 1803. latest gpu drivers. its not a corrupted files, I even reinstalled. Its a bug specifically on that new map. It doesn't happen on SR or HA
